```{r Packaages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(sf)
library(macleish)
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
macleish_layers[["trails"]] # 15 lines
```

```{r}
trails <- macleish_layers[["trails"]] %>% 
  mutate(length = st_length(geometry)) %>% 
  group_by(name) %>% 
  summarize(total_length = sum(length))

leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addPolylines(data = trails, popup = ~name)
```
